00057 using System;
00058 using System.Collections.Generic;
00059 
00060 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00061 {
00068     public class LinearSplineInterpolation :
00069         IInterpolationMethod
00070     {
00071         SplineInterpolation _spline;
00072 
00076         public
00077         LinearSplineInterpolation()
00078         {
00079             _spline = new SplineInterpolation();
00080         }
00081 
00086         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00087         {
00088             get { return _spline.SupportsDifferentiation; }
00089         }
00090 
00095         public bool SupportsIntegration
00096         {
00097             get { return _spline.SupportsIntegration; }
00098         }
00099 
00105         public
00106         void
00107         Init(
00108             IList<double> t,
00109             IList<double> x
00110             )
00111         {
00112             if(null == t)
00113             {
00114                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00115             }
00116 
00117             if(null == x)
00118             {
00119                 throw new ArgumentNullException("x");
00120             }
00121 
00122             if(t.Count < 2)
00123             {
00124                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("t");
00125             }
00126 
00127             if(t.Count != x.Count)
00128             {
00129                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentVectorsSameLengths);
00130             }
00131 
00132             double[] c = new double[4 * (t.Count - 1)];
00133             double[] tt = new double[t.Count];
00134             t.CopyTo(tt, 0);
00135             double[] xx = new double[x.Count];
00136             x.CopyTo(xx, 0);
00137 
00138             Sorting.Sort(tt, xx);
00139 
00140             for(int i = 0, j = 0; i < tt.Length - 1; i++, j += 4)
00141             {
00142                 c[j] = xx[i];
00143                 c[j + 1] = (xx[i + 1] - xx[i]) / (tt[i + 1] - tt[i]);
00144                 c[j + 2] = 0;
00145                 c[j + 3] = 0;
00146             }
00147 
00148             _spline.Init(tt, c);
00149         }
00150 
00156         public
00157         double
00158         Interpolate(
00159             double t
00160             )
00161         {
00162             return _spline.Interpolate(t);
00163         }
00164 
00172         public
00173         double
00174         Differentiate(
00175             double t,
00176             out double first,
00177             out double second
00178             )
00179         {
00180             return _spline.Differentiate(t, out first, out second);
00181         }
00182 
00189         public
00190         double
00191         Integrate(
00192             double t
00193             )
00194         {
00195             return _spline.Integrate(t);
00196         }
00197     }
00198 }
